thread.title: Pressure on Real Madrid intensifies for LaLiga top spot | MARCA in English
thread.title_full: Pressure on Real Madrid intensifies for LaLiga top spot | MARCA in English

author: David G. Medina
title: Pressure on Real Madrid intensifies for LaLiga top spot | MARCA in English

organizations.name: los blancos pressure on real madrid

text:
Real Madrid Barcelona, Atletico and Sevilla all play before Los Blancos Pressure on Real Madrid intensifies for LaLiga top spot Shared Updated 25/02/2017 10:11 CET 
B arcelona were temporary league leaders last week, and the Blaugrana could have the opportunity once again if they are able to attain all three points against Atletico Madrid at the Estadio Vicente Calderon on Sunday. 
Sevilla too have an important match in the city derby against Betis on Saturday, although even with a victory Los Nervionenses would remain in second place, level on points but with a worse goal average than Real. 
Even if Barcelona were to lose, Atletico would then only be three points behind the Catalan club, and it would reignite a LaLiga push from Real's crosstown rivals. 
All in all, the top four are all within striking distance of each other, and the pressure is on, as the different times and fixture dates add to the excitement and suffering. BEST OF MARCA
